sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The galeon package contains galeon and galeon-config-tool.

sect3.title: galeon
sect3.para: galeon sets LD_LIBRARY_PATH and MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME before executing galeon-bin.

sect3.title: galeon-config-tool
sect3.para: galeon-config-tool clears settings, installs schemas, removes schemas and fixes permissions in gconf.
